metaData.description: {"id": "public_trust_survey", "title": "Bank of Canada: Public Trust in Financial System Survey", "description": "Bank of Canada annual survey of Canadian public trust in the financial system and central bank. Important for policy communication effectiveness.", "column_descriptions": {"date": "Observation date", "overall_trust": "Pct of Canadians who trust the Bank of Canada overall", "overall_neutral": "Pct with neutral view of Bank of Canada", "overall_distrust": "Pct who distrust Bank of Canada", "trust_inflation_control": "Pct who trust BoC to control inflation", "distrust_inflation_control": "Pct who distrust BoC's inflation control", "trust_financial_system": "Pct who trust Canadian financial system", "distrust_financial_system": "Pct who distrust financial system", "trust_economy_management": "Pct who trust overall economic management", "perceive_banking_safe": "Pct who perceive banking system as safe", "perceive_financial_safe": "Pct who perceive financial system as safe", "aware_inflation_target": "Pct aware of 2% inflation target", "aware_interest_rate": "Pct aware of current policy interest rate", "understand_rate_impact": "Pct who understand how interest rates affect economy", "aware_banknote_security": "Pct aware of banknote security features", "aware_financial_system": "Pct with awareness of Canadian financial system"}}
